subject: From the Desk Of:
body:
From the Desk Of:
CEO: Mr Jamie Dimon
270 Park Ave. New York City, New York USA
JP Morgan Chase Bank New York (Code JP 2)
This is to bring to your kind notice that your outstanding payment of $10,000,000.00 which has been with our central paying office from United Nations has been signed and Approved for payment after series of meeting with our board of directors,also bear in mind that We want to conclude all payment before the 4th quarter of 2023 runs out for you to receive your Fund.
Be informed that your payment fund is on the first batch list that will receive their payment before the end of Octorber 2023. Let it be known to you that the crediting of your funds into your bank account does not require any form of delay and for that, any form of delay must be avoided.
Therefore, we the management board of JP Morgan Chase & Co. have unanimously agreed to set up an account with our bank on your behalf so that your total funds $10 Million will be remitted for immediate confirmation. However, for us the management to implement this action of setting up the account on your behalf, provide the below requested information in your next email so that we the management will successfully open a new account on your behalf:
Your Full Name:
Your Complete Address:
Direct Tell: Number:
Mobile Number:
Occupation
Nationality.
Therefore, to enable us achieve our goal to release your Fund to you, you are advice to reconfirm to us the below information to enable us conclude this transaction with you. Kindly respond back to us immediately you receive this email and always recognize this bank code to know when you receive a scam mail in the name of JP Morgan Chase Bank.....Bank Code (JP 2).
Waiting for your immediate response.
Thanks for your Co-operation.
Yours Faithfully,
Mr Jamie Dimon:
Chief Executive Officer
270 Park Ave, New York City, New York USA
JP Morgan Chase Bank...Code (JP2)
Website:- /www.jpmorganchase.com
officemail12@mail.com

subject: Re:   From the Desk Of:
body:
Hello,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I'm thrilled to hear about the payment from the United Nations and that it's been approved. It's great news indeed!

I'm curious, how did my name come up for this payment? And could you please provide more details about this fund? Is there any specific project or reason associated with this fund?

Also, I would like to know more about the process of setting up an account with JP Morgan Chase Co. Could you explain a bit more about how it works?

Looking forward to your response.

Best regards.

Best wishes,
Christina
